lifeGroups.title: Join a Life Group
lifeGroups.description: The best way to get connected at Church is by joining one of our Life Groups. We meet in locations all across the city in homes, coffee shops, and workplaces for God pleasing fun times, relationships, Bible studies, and prayers.
